item.title: mahamad-rAza-khAn 1890
item.description: विस्तारः (द्रष्टुं नोद्यम्) (Old pamphlet, unverified, circulated on whatsapp.) अण्ड्रुम् इण्ड्रुम् स्वामि तेसिगनिन् विरोदिगळ् तॆन्गलैयार्गळे. स्वामि दॆसिगळ् वाऴ्न्दरुळिन कालत्तिले अवरुडैय तिरुमाळिगै वासलिले सॆरुप्पुगळैक् कट्टि तॊङ्ग-विट्टवर्गळ् तॆन्गलैयार्गळे. स्वामिदेशिकनिन् (तिरुवडिगळै) कालै वारिविट्टवर्गळुम् तॆन्गलैयार्गळे. This is a very sensational appeal which discloses how wild certain jarring elements in the physical and mental constitution of the two Iyengar sectarians to wit Vadagalais and Thengalais are at work against each other for reciprocal ruination in consequence of some silly difference in the matter of observing certain, rituals during the pooja.
